title: Live TV
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Violence in mass media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television and youth
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television and children
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs for children
description: Aimed at illustrating the influence of television on impressionable young minds aged six to eleven, this video and activity guide is about four humans and one anthropomorphised television - "TV man" - on a mission to locate three missing classroom turtles that have disappeared from Jamie's yard. As they close in on the missing pets, the four children must rationalise between the suggested solutions of TV man based on fictitious screen life and their natural instincts. Human know-how wins in the end.
